A4.text: Celine Dion would be performing one of the new original songs 'How Does a Moment Last Forever' to play over the end titles.

A5.text: Josh Groban was announced to be performing the new original song 'Evermore'.

A6.text: She duetted with Peabo Bryson on the title track to Disney's animated film Beauty and the Beast (1991).
